snippet.title: Beat Saber Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Beat Saber is a unique VR rhythm game, where your goal is to slash the beats (represented by small cubes) as they are coming at you.
http://www.beatsaber.com

The game should be out in Q1 2018.

The song in this trailer is part of the game's OST and will be released later with the game.
